trans-unit.source: Exercise – Sell a Rented Truck to a Customer

seg-source.mrk: Exercise – Sell a Rented Truck to a Customer

trans-unit.source: On February 3, 2019 customer Tanner Transport (R-20000) rents a truck for approximately two months because the company is short of transportation vehicles at that time.

seg-source.mrk: On February 3, 2019 customer Tanner Transport (R-20000) rents a truck for approximately two months because the company is short of transportation vehicles at that time.

trans-unit.source: When the customer receives the March 3rd invoice, they realize that they will be in need of the truck for a much longer period of time and the one that is rented meets all their needs. The customer asks to buy the truck at the end of the rental period as a used one instead of renting it any longer.

seg-source.mrk: When the customer receives the March 3rd invoice, they realize that they will be in need of the truck for a much longer period of time and the one that is rented meets all their needs.
The customer asks to buy the truck at the end of the rental period as a used one instead of renting it any longer.

trans-unit.source: Create a Rent Order

seg-source.mrk: Create a Rent Order

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to create a rent order:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to create a rent order:

trans-unit.source: Insert a new rent order for customer R-20000.

seg-source.mrk: Insert a new rent order for customer R-20000.

trans-unit.source:
Expand the Rental FastTab and enter the following:
  1. Rental Rate Code = Month
  2. Rental Start Date = 02/03/19
  3. Rental End Date = 03/31/19
  4. Prepaid = Yes

seg-source.mrk: Expand the Rental FastTab and enter the following:
• Rental Rate Code = Month
• Rental Start Date = 02/03/19
• Rental End Date = 03/31/19
• Prepaid = Yes

trans-unit.source:
On the first line of the Lines FastTab, enter the following:
  1. Type = Item
  2. No. = R-20000-01
  3. Quantity = 1
  4. Rate Unit Price = add if values are missing on Item or Rate Component lines

seg-source.mrk: On the first line of the Lines FastTab, enter the following:
• Type = Item
<li class="ccTextvorlageNumberedList">No.
• Quantity = 1
• Rate Unit Price = add if values are missing on Item or Rate Component lines

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Item Tracking Lines.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Item Tracking Lines.

trans-unit.source: With the Shipment option selected, click OK.

seg-source.mrk: With the Shipment option selected, click OK.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Select Entries.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Select Entries.

trans-unit.source: Note which serial number is selected and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Note which serial number is selected and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Item Tracking Lines page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Item Tracking Lines page.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source: With the Ship option selected, click OK.

seg-source.mrk: With the Ship option selected, click OK.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source: Select the Invoice option and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Invoice option and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: In the Posting Date field, enter 02/03/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Posting Date field, enter 02/03/19.

trans-unit.source: In the Invoice to Date field, enter 03/02/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Invoice to Date field, enter 03/02/19.

trans-unit.source: Click OK and accept all confirmation messages.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK and accept all confirmation messages.

trans-unit.source: Open and post the Service Invoice Rental.

seg-source.mrk: Open and post the Service Invoice Rental.

trans-unit.source: Set the Work Date to 03/03/19.

seg-source.mrk: Set the Work Date to 03/03/19.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon of the Rent Order, click Home > Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon of the Rent Order, click Home > Post.

trans-unit.source: Select the Invoice option and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Invoice option and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: In the Posting Date field, enter 03/03/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Posting Date field, enter 03/03/19.

trans-unit.source: In the Invoice to Date field, enter 04/02/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Invoice to Date field, enter 04/02/19.

trans-unit.source: Click OK and accept all confirmation messages.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK and accept all confirmation messages.

trans-unit.source: Open and post the Service Invoice Rental.

seg-source.mrk: Open and post the Service Invoice Rental.

trans-unit.source: Sell the Rented Truck

seg-source.mrk: Sell the Rented Truck

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to sell the rented truck from the Rent Order:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to sell the rented truck from the Rent Order:

trans-unit.source: In the Posting Date field, enter 04/02/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Posting Date field, enter 04/02/19.

trans-unit.source: In the Rental Return Date field on the rental item line, enter 04/02/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Rental Return Date field on the rental item line, enter 04/02/19.

trans-unit.source: In the Return Qty. to Receive field, enter 1.

seg-source.mrk: In the <span class="Bold">Return Qty.
to Receive field, enter 1.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Home > Reopen.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Home > Reopen.

trans-unit.source: Delete any unposted One-Time Invoicing positions for services to be performed on returned items, for example, a charge to clean the rented item is no longer applicable because the item will not be physically returned to the rental company.

seg-source.mrk: Delete any unposted One-Time Invoicing positions for services to be performed on returned items, for example, a charge to clean the rented item is no longer applicable because the item will not be physically returned to the rental company.

trans-unit.source: Use the “Choose Columns” function to add the Sell Item from Rent field to the Lines FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: Use the “Choose Columns” function to add the Sell Item from Rent field to the Lines FastTab.

trans-unit.source: Select the Sell Item from Rent check box on the rental item line.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Sell Item from Rent check box on the rental item line.

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Functions > Sales Allocation.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Functions > Sales Allocation.

trans-unit.source: : <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2017-09-30T20:57:21.1640355-05:00" MadCap:creator="NDOKS" MadCap:initials="ND" MadCap:comment="In 2017, the Sales Price field is automatically populated with the price from the rental line. Is that correct? In 2016, it was 0.00.\r\n\r\nIs it ok that now it's populated; was that done intentionally?" MadCap:editor="NTadajewski0100" MadCap:editDate="2018-08-24T11:13:26.6520169-05:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Sales from Rental page</MadCap:annotation>

seg-source.mrk: : <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2017-09-30T20:57:21.1640355-05:00" MadCap:creator="NDOKS" MadCap:initials="ND" MadCap:comment="In 2017, the Sales Price field is automatically populated with the price from the rental line. Is that correct? In 2016, it was 0.00.\r\n\r\nIs it ok that now it's populated; was that done intentionally?" MadCap:editor="NTadajewski0100" MadCap:editDate="2018-08-24T11:13:26.6520169-05:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Sales from Rental page</MadCap:annotation>

trans-unit.source: Select the Use Charge check box.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Use Charge check box.

trans-unit.source: In the Sales Price field, enter the sales price of the truck.

seg-source.mrk: In the Sales Price field, enter the sales price of the truck.

trans-unit.source: Click the Chargeable Rental Profit amount.

seg-source.mrk: Click the Chargeable Rental Profit amount.

trans-unit.source: : Rental Entry Select page

seg-source.mrk: : Rental Entry Select page

trans-unit.source: Click Actions > Charge All to select the Charge to Sales Price check box on each line.

seg-source.mrk: Click Actions > Charge All to select the Charge to Sales Price check box on each line.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: The Charge to Sales Price check box can be selected/cleared manually on each line as well.

seg-source.mrk: The Charge to Sales Price check box can be selected/cleared manually on each line as well.

trans-unit.source: Click OK. Notice that the Sales Amount (per Unit) and Sales Amount (Qty.) fields now contain the Sales Price minus the amounts selected for charge.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK.
Notice that the Sales Amount (per Unit) and Sales Amount (Qty.) fields now contain the Sales Price minus the amounts selected for charge.

trans-unit.source: : Sale from Rental page with chargeable amounts applied

seg-source.mrk: : Sale from Rental page with chargeable amounts applied

trans-unit.source: Repeat steps 9–13 for Chargeable Rate Part Profit and Chargeable One Time Profit as needed.

seg-source.mrk: Repeat steps 9–13 for Chargeable Rate Part Profit and Chargeable One Time Profit as needed.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Sale from Rental page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Sale from Rental page.

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Item Tracking Lines.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Item Tracking Lines.

trans-unit.source: Select the Receive option and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Receive option and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: Confirm that the serial number is correct and then click OK to close the Item Tracking Lines page.

seg-source.mrk: Confirm that the serial number is correct and then click OK to close the Item Tracking Lines page.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source:
Select the Receive option and then click OK. Notice the following:
  • The receipt is processed on the original item line (and any relevant rate components).
  • A new Sales line is added that contains the calculated Sales Price as the Unit Price.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Receive option and then click OK.
Notice the following:
<li class="ccTextvorlageNumberedList">The receipt is processed on the original item line (and any relevant rate components).
• A new Sales line is added that contains the calculated Sales Price as the Unit Price.

trans-unit.source: : Rent Order after rental item sales processing

seg-source.mrk: : Rent Order after rental item sales processing

trans-unit.source: Select the Sales line and then on the Lines FastTab, click Line > Item Tracking Lines.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Sales line and then on the Lines FastTab, click Line > Item Tracking Lines.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Select Entries.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Select Entries.

trans-unit.source: Confirm that the serial number originally rented is selected and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Confirm that the serial number originally rented is selected and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Item Tracking Lines page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Item Tracking Lines page.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source: With the Ship option selected, click OK. The following message appears:

seg-source.mrk: With the Ship option selected, click OK.
The following message appears:

trans-unit.source: : Customer No. change confirmation request

seg-source.mrk: : Customer No.
change confirmation request

trans-unit.source: Click Yes to change the Customer No. on the service item from the Internal Customer to the customer that is purchasing the item.

seg-source.mrk: Click Yes to change the Customer No.
on the service item from the Internal Customer to the customer that is purchasing the item.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source: Select the Invoice option and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Invoice option and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: In the Posting Date field, enter 04/02/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Posting Date field, enter 04/02/19.

trans-unit.source: In the Invoice to Date field, enter 04/02/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Invoice to Date field, enter 04/02/19.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to create the invoice and then accept all confirmation messages.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to create the invoice and then accept all confirmation messages.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Navigate > Invoices.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Navigate > Invoices.

trans-unit.source: Open the invoice and notice that item R-20000-01 appears on the line with the calculated Sales Allocation amount as the unit price.

seg-source.mrk: Open the invoice and notice that item R-20000-01 appears on the line with the calculated Sales Allocation amount as the unit price.

trans-unit.source: : Sales invoice for the sold item

seg-source.mrk: : Sales invoice for the sold item

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post and then click Yes to post the invoice.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post and then click Yes to post the invoice.

trans-unit.source: Escape back to the rent order.

seg-source.mrk: Escape back to the rent order.

trans-unit.source: This exercise showed how to process the sale of rented item that occurred when the rental period ended. Depending on when/how the return is processed, there are different sales invoicing situations:

seg-source.mrk: This exercise showed how to process the sale of rented item that occurred when the rental period ended.
Depending on when/how the return is processed, there are different sales invoicing situations:

trans-unit.source: If rent revenues were invoiced past the Rental Return Date, the system will create a Credit Memo on invoicing.

seg-source.mrk: If rent revenues were invoiced past the Rental Return Date, the system will create a Credit Memo on invoicing.

trans-unit.source: If invoicing has not yet reached the Rental Return Date, the system will add a sales position on the next Invoice (which then can be included with the Sales Invoicing).

seg-source.mrk: If invoicing has not yet reached the Rental Return Date, the system will add a sales position on the next Invoice (which then can be included with the Sales Invoicing).

trans-unit.source: If the return was already posted, manually create a Sales Order from the Rent Order by clicking Actions > Create Sales Order on the ribbon.

seg-source.mrk: If the return was already posted, manually create a Sales Order from the Rent Order by clicking Actions > Create Sales Order on the ribbon.
